title: Test
yAxis: Share of respondents who use network most often
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents who use network most often in each Platform on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Instagram where Share of respondents who use network most often is 25.0.
The lowest category is found at Other where Share of respondents who use network most often is 1.0.
The highest value at Instagram is almost 25.0 times larger than the minimum value of Other.
The highest value at Instagram is almost 25.0 times larger than the minimum value of Other.
The difference between the max Platform Instagram and min Platform Other is 24.0.
